root: ^Oh, hello, hello. Sorry, if you can give me—Oh! Hello! You must be here for—For...
^Yes, for the murder. Private Investigator Tom Trilby. You are?
^Nice to meet you, Sadie. I'm hoping to find someone who might be able to direct me to the scene of the crime.
^Oh, of course! Yes, if you could give me a moment...Um, yes, just...If you want to meet me in the back, I'll join you there.
